awakenings.effect: When in [Frost Cannon] state, critical rate increases by 15%.
When in [Frost Cannon] state, damage taken reduced by 10%.
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4. Essential skill level upgrade
[Ultimate] and [Passive] level and level cap +4. Essential skill level upgrade

effects: After using ultimate skill, normal attack and Auto skill damage increased by 60% for 10 seconds
memoryCard.name: During Military Academy Training

auto.description: Base: Deals ice damage equal to 180% of Attack to enemy. Enhanced (during Frost Cannon): Deals ice damage equal to 180% of Attack to enemy and surrounding 4-meter range
auto.name: Bullet Hell Scatter (弹幕散射)

normal.description: Deals ice damage equal to 96% of Attack to designated enemy. Enhanced (during Frost Cannon): Deals ice damage equal to 96% of Attack to enemy and surrounding 2-meter range
normal.name: Shatter! Shatter! Shatter! (碎！碎！碎！)

passive.description: Each normal attack increases critical rate by 2.4%. Maximum 20 stacks (48% maximum critical rate increase).
passive.name: Reckless Spirit's Foundation (冒失鬼的底蕴)

ultimate.description: Enters [Frost Cannon] state for 10 seconds. Increases attack speed by 58%. Gains enhanced normal attacks and enhanced skills. All abilities become AoE during this state
ultimate.name: Frost Cannon Transformation
